sentences.en: All night she grinds her teeth together , keeping me awake.
sentences.cn: 她整夜咬牙, 吵得我睡不着觉.

sentences.en: Artists finally awoke to the aesthetic possibilities of photography.
sentences.cn: 艺术家终于意识到了摄影的美学潜质。

sentences.en: Emma lay awake half the night, worrying.
sentences.cn: 埃玛忧心忡忡，半宿都没睡着。

sentences.en: He came fully awake to hear the bath running.
sentences.cn: 他完全清醒了，听见浴缸里的水在流。

sentences.en: He had been drinking mugs of coffee to keep himself awake.
sentences.cn: 为让自己保持清醒，他一杯接一杯地喝咖啡。

sentences.en: He likes to awake to the sound of a radio.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢在广播声中醒来.

sentences.en: He was the only one boy awake at that time.
sentences.cn: 他是当时惟一醒着的男孩.

sentences.en: How do you stay awake during boring lectures?
sentences.cn: 听无聊的课你是怎样不让自己睡着的？

sentences.en: I could not relax and still felt wide awake.
sentences.cn: 我无法放松，还是很清醒。

sentences.en: I hope he’s awake now.
sentences.cn: 我希望他现在醒着。

sentences.en: I know you're really awake; you're just having a joke with me.
sentences.cn: 我知道你是醒着的, 你不过在跟我开玩笑罢了.

sentences.en: I lay awake through the wee small hours, waiting for the signal.
sentences.cn: 我躺到后半夜没睡, 等候信号.

sentences.en: I was glad to awake from such a nightmare.
sentences.cn: 我庆幸终于从噩梦中醒来了.

sentences.en: I was in that half-and-half land where you are not completely asleep nor completely awake.
sentences.cn: 我当时半睡半醒。

sentences.en: It was midday when she awoke.
sentences.cn: 她醒来时已是中午。

sentences.en: My own eyes had felt heavy-lidded, but now I was wide awake.
sentences.cn: 我自己刚才也觉得眼睛都快睁不开了，不过现在我清醒得很。

sentences.en: Nightmares kept me awake all night.
sentences.cn: 噩梦扰得我整夜未眠。

sentences.en: She was still only half awake when I brought her a cup of coffee.
sentences.cn: 我给她端去咖啡的时候，她还是半睡半醒的样子。

sentences.en: Suddenly he found himself awake and fully alert.
sentences.cn: 突然他发觉自己醒了过来，而且高度警觉。

sentences.en: The explorer was ever awake for the dangers that surrounded him.
sentences.cn: 这个探险家时刻提防着周围的危险.

sentences.en: The hypnotic state actually lies somewhere between being awake and being asleep.
sentences.cn: 催眠状态实际上介乎清醒和睡眠之间。

sentences.en: The noise brought him wide awake (=  completely awake  ) .
sentences.cn: 那声音使他睡意全无。

sentences.en: To keep themselves awake (=  stop themselves from going to sleep  ) they sat on the floor and told each other stories.
sentences.cn: 为了不让自己睡着，他们坐在地板上相互讲故事。

sentences.en: We awoke to a day of brilliant sunshine.
sentences.cn: 我们醒来时阳光明媚。

words.tran_cn: 觉醒，意识到；醒来；被唤起

trans.tran_en: to wake up, or to make someone wake up
to wake up, or to make someone wake up
to wake up, or to make someone wake up
